<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This register is defined in the tail block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">          MachineBasicBlock &#42;SrcBB = J.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we didn&#39;t duplicate a bb into a particular predecessor, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// might still have added an entry to SSAUpdateVals to correcly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// recompute SSA. If that case, avoid adding a dummy extra argument</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this PHI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SrcBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#adc8f1be4a77ae671ac139d5f06b44deb">isSuccessor</a>(SuccBB))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> SrcReg = J.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Idx != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(Idx).setReg(SrcReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">            Idx = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Determine if it is profitable to duplicate this block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the limit on the cost to duplicate. When optimizing for size,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// duplicate only one, because one branch instruction can be eliminated to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// compensate for the duplication.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">    MaxDuplicateCount = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the block to be duplicated ends in an unanalyzable fallthrough, don&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// duplicate it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A similar check is necessary in MachineBlockPlacement to make sure pairs of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the target has hardware branch prediction that can handle indirect</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branches, duplicating them can often make them predictable when there</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are common paths through the code.  The limit needs to be high enough</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to allow undoing the effects of tail merging and other optimizations</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Non-duplicable things shouldn&#39;t be tail-duplicated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TailDuplicator::appendCopies will erroneously place COPYs after</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// INLINEASM&#95;BR instructions after 4b0aa5724fea, which demonstrates the same</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        for the COPY when replacing PHIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == TargetOpcode::INLINEASM&#95;BR)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isBundle())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/dfapacketizer-cpp/#acc16edf21eddec420cd4b27adb3111c6">InstrCount</a> += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getBundleSize();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isMetaInstruction())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/dfapacketizer-cpp/#acc16edf21eddec420cd4b27adb3111c6">InstrCount</a> &gt; MaxDuplicateCount)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumPhis += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Duplicating a BB which has both multiple predecessors and successors will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may cause huge amount of PHI nodes. If we want to remove this limitation,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we have to address https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/issues/78578.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NB. This basically unfactors computed gotos that were factored early on in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the compilation process to speed up edge based data flow. If we do not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unfactor them again, it can seriously pessimize code with many computed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// jumps in the source code, such as interpreters. Therefore we do not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// restrict the computed gotos.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!HasComputedGoto &amp;&amp; TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a03936a9b37da541420049422204ab206">pred&#95;size</a>() &gt; <a href="#a44220b47eb71fa141e85efc36579ae27">TailDupPredSize</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">      TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a81626de817a0cb021ff8e915cf1942ed">succ&#95;size</a>() &gt; <a href="#a5cbdacc193404b637719f0e857254113">TailDupSuccSize</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If TailBB or any of its successors contains a phi, we may have to add a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// large number of additional phis with additional incoming values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumPhis != 0 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad88ff1529541fb4e243cc8ed90b11131">successors</a>(), &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">          return any&#95;of(&#42;MBB, &#91;&#93;(MachineInstr &amp;MI) &#123; return MI.isPHI(); &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if any of the successors of TailBB has a PHI node in which the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value corresponding to TailBB uses a subregister.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a phi node uses a register paired with a subregister, the actual</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;value type&quot; of the phi may differ from the type of the register without</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// any subregisters. Due to a bug, tail duplication may add a new operand</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// without a necessary subregister, producing an invalid code. This is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// demonstrated by test/CodeGen/Hexagon/tail-dup-subreg-abort.ll.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Disable tail duplication for this case for now, until the problem is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fixed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;SB : TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isPHI())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle the nasty case in that we duplicated a block that is part of a loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into some but not all of its predecessors. For example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    1 -&gt; 2 &lt;-&gt; 3                 |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//          \\                      |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//           \\---&gt; rest            |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if we duplicate 2 into 1 but not into 3, we end up with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 12 -&gt; 3 &lt;-&gt; 2 -&gt; rest           |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   \\             /               |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    \\-----&gt;-----/                |</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there was a &quot;var = phi(1, 3)&quot; in 2, it has to be ultimately replaced</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with a phi in 3 (which now dominates 2).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// What we do here is introduce a copy in 3 of the register defined by the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// phi, just like when we are duplicating 2 into 3, but we don&#39;t copy any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// real instructions or remove the 3 -&gt; 2 edge from the phi in 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MachineBasicBlock &#42;PredBB : Preds) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
